changelog: Added: Unused Disks Management - view, reattach, or delete detached disks in Hardware tab
Added: ReattachDiskModal - full UI for reattaching unused disks with bus type selection (SCSI/VirtIO/SATA/IDE)
Added: API error handling with automatic retry logic (up to 3 attempts with increasing delay)
Added: Config load error display with manual retry button
Added: Rolling updates support without evacuating VMs
Added: EFI and Secure Boot options in VM Configuration wizard
Added: Experimental Update Scheduler button in Update Manager
Fixed: BulkMigrateModal missing useTranslation hook causing 't is not defined' error
Fixed: Cross-cluster VM migration timeout issues
Improved: Clear error state on successful config reload
